titles.title: Get Reinvesting in Opportunities for Workers (GROW) American Jobs Act
To authorize appropriations for the SelectUSA Initiative, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Manufacturing, and Trade.

bill.summary:
2/13/2015--Introduced. Get Reinvesting in Opportunities for Workers (GROW) American Jobs Act
Authorizes appropriations for FY2016-FY2020 for the SelectUSA Initiative (federal assistance aimed at increasing both foreign and domestic investment in U.S. business).
Directs the Secretary of Commerce to report to Congress during such fiscal years on Initiative activities.
